casebody.data:
No. 10-10627. Steven Walter Eason, Petitioner v. Ronald W. King, Superintendent, South Mississippi Correctional Facility. 565 U.S. 842, 132 S. Ct. 154,

181 L. Ed. 2d 70,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 6162. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
